en.title: FE welcomes legendary Philippines PBA player, Alvin Vergara Patrimonio, ¡°The Captain¡±.
en.content:
Another legendary Philippines Basketball Association (PBA) player joins FE! The ever popular " 6' 4" Alvin Vergara Patrimonio nicknamed “The Captain”. Alvin Patrimonio holds several PBA records including “most consecutive games played (596)” and ” most PBA Most Valuable Player Awards”. He is also the second player to win three Best Player of the Conference Award and also shares the distinction of having played the most Asian Games (4) with 1990 PBA MVP Allan Caidic . 

Alvin, Samboy and Allan Caidic are three of the Mythical First Team Selection.

All three are among the most,if not the most popular of the PBA legends and all three are FE QP wearers!
